div.p: At high risk for dental carries
Patient has pain in his lower left jaw and occassional bleeding from his gums - referring for dental evaluation.
The patient has not visited a dentist or received flouride treatments in the past 4 years while away at college
Pt. Education. Advised to see dentist regularly, brush 2x/day w/ fluoride toothpaste, floss
